text:
Maybe not 100% cure? #Hydroxychloroquine shows promise against #Covid19. Those who say it's 100% cure should note part of #Raoult study where 6 from 26 did not complete study->3 of them were transferred to ICU,1 other died. I'm still optimistic on it. 👇
#coronavirus #chloroquine https://t.co/kqMtuFB7qY
